<a href="https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B1FwZagazjpccE42aVpjSGQzSFk">JAFFA_1.0.tar.gz

or check it out with svn:
{{{ svn checkout http://jaffa-project.googlecode.com/svn/tags/version-1.0 jaffa-1.0 }}}

This version is identical to 0.91. Improvements of 0.9 are that it works out the read length itself and includes a few bug fixes and checks. Thanks to Aliaksei Holik for correcting the bug in the spanning pairs calculation.

You will also need the supporting data:

[https://googledrive.com/host/0B1FwZagazjpcQU9IaURTVzd6Ym8/JAFFA_REFERENCE_FILES_GENCODE19.tar.gz JAFFA_REFERENCE_FILES_GENCODE19.tar.gz] Files for the GENCODE reference transcriptome, version 19 (should work with all versions of JAFFA)



[https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B1FwZagazjpcN1NCOWhnU2hCSjQ JAFFA_REFERENCE_FILES_0.80.tar.gz] - Files for the GENCODE reference transcriptome, version 17 (works with all versions of JAFFA)
